cosmos.question: I am big and bright, and I shine in the day. I help plants grow. What am I?

hints.text: 🔥 I am very hot!
💛 I am yellow and round.
⬆️ I rise in the east and set in the west.

cosmos.question: I am round and sometimes you can see me at night. Sometimes I'm full and sometimes I'm just a sliver. What am I?

hints.text: 🐺 Werewolves like me.
🌝 I orbit the Earth.
🧀 Some people say I'm made of cheese!

cosmos.question: I twinkle in the night sky. I am very far away and made of hot gas. What am I?

hints.text: ✨ I can be different colors.
🔭 You need a telescope to see me really well.
⭐ Many of me make up constellations.

cosmos.question: I am a giant ball of gas that gives off light and heat. The Earth goes around me. What am I?

hints.text: 🔥 I am very, very hot.
🌎 Earth needs me to live.
☀️ I am the center of our solar system.

cosmos.question: I am a big group of stars that make a picture in the sky. What am I?

hints.text: 🐻 Some are named after animals.
🌌 People use me to find their way.
✨ The Big Dipper is an example.

cosmos.question: I am a cold, icy object that sometimes has a tail when I get close to the sun. What am I?

hints.text: ☄️ I am made of ice, dust, and gas.
💨 My tail points away from the sun.
❄️ People think I look like a dirty snowball.

cosmos.question: I am a small, rocky object that orbits the Sun, but I am not a planet. What am I?

hints.text: 🌠 I am smaller than a planet.
💥 I am often found between Mars and Jupiter.
🪨 I am made of rock and metal.

cosmos.question: I am a huge group of stars, gas, and dust held together by gravity. Our solar system is part of me. What am I?

hints.text: 💫 I am very, very big!
✨ I contain billions of stars.
🌌 Our one is called the Milky Way.

cosmos.question: I am a small piece of rock or metal that burns up when I enters Earth's atmosphere. People call me a shooting star. What am I?

hints.text: ☄️ I create a bright streak of light.
🌠 Some people make wishes on me.
🔥 I burn up because of friction.

cosmos.question: I am a collection of planets that all orbit around a star. Earth is part of me. What am I?

hints.text: 🪐 I am more than just one planet.
☀️ I need a star at the center.
🌎 Earth is the third planet from the sun within me.

food.question: I am yellow and you peel me before you eat me. Monkeys love me! What am I?

hints.text: 💛 I am the color of the sun.
🐒 A popular monkey food.
🍴 You can peel me before eating.

food.question: I am round and orange, and rabbits love to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🥕 I'm often eaten raw.
🐇 Bunnies enjoy munching on me.
🧡 I grow in the ground.

food.question: I am white and cold. I am a sweet treat. What am I?

hints.text: ❄️ I melt in the sun.
🍦 You can eat me in a cone.
😋 Many flavors to choose from!

food.question: I am red or green and grow on trees. You can eat me whole or in a pie. What am I?

hints.text: 🌳 I hang from branches.
🍎 Snow White loved this fruit.
🥧 I am a fruit often used in desserts.

food.question: I am long and brown, and I grow under the ground. You can bake me, mash me, or fry me. What am I?

hints.text: 🌱 I'm a root vegetable.
🍟 I am often made into fries.
🥔 You can make me into mashed form.

food.question: I am white and come from a cow. You can drink me or use me to make cheese. What am I?

hints.text: 🐄 A farm animal produces me.
🥛 I am often poured into cereal.
🧀 You can make cheese from me.

food.question: I am made of dough and have a round shape. You can put toppings on me like cheese and tomatoes. What am I?

hints.text: 🇮🇹 I come from Italy
🍕 You often eat a slice of me.
🔥 I need to be baked in an oven.

food.question: I am a fruit with a fuzzy brown skin and green flesh. I'm small, oval, and taste sweet. What am I?

hints.text: 🌿 I grow on a vine.
🥝 My name is also a bird.
🥄 You can scoop me out with a spoon.

food.question: I am small, green, and grow in a pod. People like to eat me in soup or as a side dish. What am I?

hints.text: 👪 I'm good for you to eat.
🌱 I am a legume.
🥣 Sometimes I come with carrots in a can.

food.question: I am made from wheat and often eaten for breakfast. You can spread butter or jam on me. What am I?

hints.text: 🔥 I am usually toasted.
🍞 I am a type of bread that is sliced.
🍓 You can put strawberry jam on me.
